snippet.title: Waves - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Waves is currently 50% off from https://sites.fastspring.com/squidinabox/instant/waves and can be registered on Steam.

Waves is the first game from indie developer Squid In A Box and is available to buy direct from the developer from here:
http://www.squidinabox.com/games/waves/

Or from Steam here:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/107600/

There is a demo available that contains one of the 5 game modes that can be found in the full game. In addition more game modes will be added for free in the future.

You can follow Squid In A Box on Twitter here: http://www.twitter.com/squidinabox
